name: ORSSerialPort
summary: Easy to use serial port library for Objective-C and Swift Mac apps.
description: A simple, Cocoa-like library useful for programmers writing Objective-C or Swift apps for the Mac that must communicate with external devices through a serial port (most commonly RS-232). ORSSerialPort makes it easy to find the serial ports available on the system, configure serial ports, and send and receive data. It also includes an optional request/response API to simplify structured communication with external devices.
